cause.description:
Jake's House is a young charity with only 5 years in the running working to support children and families dealing with the effects of autism located in Toronto, Ontario. The charity was founded by the parent's of Jake, David and Irene Bodanis looking to help out other families by using their own personal experiences with autism.
1. Autism is the fastest growing developmental disability with a 10-17% annual growth
2. Cost of lifelong care can be reduced by 2/3 with early diagnosis and intervention
3. 1 in 150 births are affected
4. Government support ends a very early age but difficulties continue
cause.name: Jake's House for Autistic Children
